## Derivatives in R

```{r}
fx <- expression(x^2)

df_dx <- D(fx, name = 'x')

df_dx # call it

# Evaluate the slope of f(x) at x = 831
# x <- 831
# evaluate over a range

x <- seq(from = -10, to = 10, by = 0.5)
eval(expr = df_dx)

```
